email.subject: Case File: HS-4
email.body:
Good day, agent. This case is a bit of a mystery, since it's hard to pinpoint a timeline of events. I'll just cut to the chase.
On January 14, 2020, the body of Martin Staleski was discovered in his apartment. Forensic evidence could not determine a definite time of death, making it harder to determine a timeframe and compare alibis. Needless to say, this ended up becoming a cold case pretty quickly.
The first thing we should do is try to establish a concrete time of death before we proceed. Take a look through the Case File and see what you can dig up. -G
